statements: SELECT * FROM InvestmentRegulations;
SELECT rule_number, rule_description FROM InvestmentRegulations;
SELECT rule_number, rule_description, regulator FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE rule_type = 'Legal';
SELECT DISTINCT regulator FROM InvestmentRegulations;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentRegulations ORDER BY rule_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY regulation_number DESC
SELECT regulation_number, regulation_type FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' AND effective_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Tax' ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT * FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Foreign Investment' AND country IN ('UK', 'Germany', 'France')
SELECT MAX(effective_date) AS latest_effective_date, COUNT(*) AS num_regulations FROM InvestmentRegulations GROUP BY country HAVING num_regulations > 5
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE description LIKE '%information%';
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, is_mandatory FROM compliance_requirements WHERE is_mandatory = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT regulation_name FROM regulations WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT requirement_name FROM compliance_requirements WHERE is_mandatory = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM investment_regulations;
SELECT id, name, category FROM investment_regulations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM investment_regulations WHERE category = 'Finance';
SELECT id, name, description FROM investment_regulations WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM compliance_requirements WHERE deadline > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT name, description FROM investment_regulations WHERE category='Investment'
SELECT * FROM investment_regulations ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, details FROM compliance_requirements WHERE deadline > NOW()
SELECT * FROM regulation_compliance WHERE regulation_id = 3
SELECT * FROM investment_regulations WHERE name LIKE '%regulations%'
SELECT * FROM Investment_Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Investment_Regulations WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT entity_name, registration_date, country FROM Investment_Entities ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, description, deadline FROM Compliance_Requirements WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT log_date, entity_id, requirement_id, compliance_status FROM Compliance_Logs WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Regulations WHERE regulation_id > 5;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Investment_Regulations WHERE effective_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT entity_name, registration_date FROM Investment_Entities WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Requirements WHERE deadline >= '2022-05-01' AND deadline <= '2022-08-31';
SELECT log_date, compliance_status FROM Compliance_Logs WHERE requirement_id = 3 AND compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM investment_regulations;
SELECT product_name, risk_level FROM investment_products WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT officer_name, email, phone_number FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT * FROM investment_firms;
SELECT * FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT officer_name, email FROM compliance_officers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT firm_name, location, founding_date FROM investment_firms WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY founding_date DESC;

SELECT product_name, risk_level, compliance_due_date FROM investment_products JOIN investment_regulations ON investment_products.regulation_id = investment_regulations.regulation_id ORDER BY compliance_due_date ASC;
SELECT check_id, check_description, check_date, officer_name FROM compliance_checks JOIN compliance_officers ON compliance_checks.officer_id = compliance_officers.officer_id ORDER BY check_date DESC;
